ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of ALLISON LESLIE SMITH of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective January 5, 2020.
